text: Yeah, welcome to the club, pal.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: The universe is basically an animal. It grazes on the ordinary. It creates infinite idiots just to eat them.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: The universe is basically an animal. It grazes on the ordinary. It creates infinite idiots just to eat them.Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere. We’re all going to die. Come watch TV.
author: Morty Smith

text: To live is to risk it all; otherwise you’re just an inert chunk of randomly assembled molecules drifting wherever the universe blows you.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: Weddings are basically funerals with a cake.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: Listen, I’m not the nicest guy in the universe, because I’m the smartest, and being nice is something stupid people do to hedge their bets.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: Life is effort and I’ll stop when I die!
author: Jerry Smith

text: I’m sorry, but your opinion means very little to me.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: Don’t deify the people who leave you.
author: Beth Smith

text: Excuse me. Coming through. What are you here for? Just kidding, I don’t care.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: Losers look stuff up while the rest of us are carpin' all them diems.
author: Summer Smith

text: When you are an a--hole, it doesn't matter how right you are. Nobody wants to give you the satisfaction.
author: Morty Smith

text: Having a family doesn’t mean that you stop being an individual. You know the best thing you can do for the people that depend on you? Be honest with them, even if it means setting them free.
author: Mr. Meeseeks

text: You're not the cause of your parents' misery. You're just a symptom of it.
author: Summer Smith

text: Well, then get your s--t together, get it all together, and put it in a backpack, all your s--t, so it's together. And if you gotta take it somewhere, take it somewhere, you know, take it to the s--t store and sell it, or put it in the s--t museum. I don't care what you do, you just gotta get it together. Get your s--t together.
author: Morty Smith

text: I realize now I’m attracted to you for the same reason I can’t be with you: You can’t change. And I have no problem with that, but it clearly means I have a problem with myself.
author: Unity

text: I didn't know freedom meant people doing stuff that sucks.
author: Summer Smith

text: How many of these are just horrible mistakes I made? I mean, maybe I’d stop making so many if I let myself learn from them.
author: Morty Smith
